text: Traianos Liantzakis in the early 20th century. Traianos (Traikos) Liantzakis () or Lantzakis was a Greek chieftain of the Greek Struggle for Macedonia. == Biography == He was born in the 1850s in Zelovo (now Antartiko) of Florina. He was a Kodjabashi of his village and with his brothers, Georgios, Simos and Michael struggled to repel the early Bulgarian activities near the village.John S. Koliopoulos (editor), "Αφανείς, γηγενείς Μακεδονομάχοι", Εταιρεία Μακεδονικών Σπουδών, University Studio Press, Thessaloniki, 2008, p. 163, 164Hellenic Army General Staff, Διεύθυνσις Ιστορίας Στρατού, "Ο Μακεδονικός Αγών και τα εις Θράκην γεγονότα", Athens, 1979. Along with Naoum and Pavlos Kyrou they exterminated the Komitadji Lazo Poptraikov, who was a high-ranked member of the Bulgarian Committee of the regions of Florina and Kastoria in 1903.Hellenic Army General Staff, Διεύθυνσις Ιστορίας Στρατού, "Ο Μακεδονικός Αγών και τα εις Θράκην γεγονότα", Athens 1979, p. 106 On 14 September 1904, Efthymios Kaoudis with his armed group entered Zelovo, where they met with Anastasios and Filippos Stefos, who asked them to provide them guns to make an armed group. The people of Zelovo though, suspected Kaoudis of being assosicated with IMRO or something related and demanded him and his group to leave the village, even after Pavlos Kyrou ensured them that Kaoudis is not what they believe. The misunderstandment had to be solved by Liantzakis, who as the representor of the village went to Monastir to get insurance from the Greek consul that Kaoudis was acting under the general orders of the Greek state which he was.Gistor, Τα σώματα του Καούδη και Μελά (Αύγουστος 1904) [The groups of Kaoudis and Melas (August 1904)] In the same year Liantzakis set up an armed group and acted in the regions of Prespa and Korestia against Bulgarian Komitadjis until the end of the Macedonian Struggle in 1908. == References == Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:Year of death unknown Category:Greek people of the Macedonian Struggle Category:Greek Macedonians Category:Macedonian revolutionaries (Greek) Category:People from Prespes
title: Traianos Liantzakis
